email.subject: Call for Papers – PROFES 2025 Research Papers Track

event.name: PROFES 2025
event.type: 26th International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement

call_for_papers.aims_and_scope: The International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement (PROFES) is one of the leading international forums for software engineering professionals to present and discuss innovation, trends, experiences, and challenges in the field of software process and product quality improvement.

research_track.invitation: The PROFES 2025 Research Track invites the submission of high-quality full papers presenting original research, empirical studies, industrial experiences, and case reports related to software development processes and their impact on software product quality.
topics_of_interest: Process modeling, management, assessment, and improvement
Value- and feedback-driven software development, agile and lean methods and processes
Software analytics and empirical research with actionable insights on software products and processes
Predictive models for software engineering tasks
Infrastructure and processes for iterative or incremental software delivery
Product quality models for software, systems, and services
Project management techniques, including global and/or distributed development
Software engineering processes for AI-enabled systems, including MLOps
AI and data-driven techniques for software process improvement (AI4SE)
Methods for developing cloud-based systems and services, including monolithic to cloud-native migration
Processes and methods for COTS and open-source development
Service engineering processes and software business models

additional_info.submission_instructions: To contribute to SEWORLD, send your submission to mailto:[log in to unmask]
additional_info.seworld_info: http://sigsoft.org/resources/seworld.html provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
